snippet.title: Transit King Android Gameplay HD
snippet.description:
Transit King Simulation game By BON Games. (Android)
*SUBSCRIBE* FOR MORE GAMES: http://bit.ly/oglgameplays

Open Beta - Limited amount of downloads!

Start your transportation business and grow your island into an economic superpower!

Transport goods from farms and mines to factories and cities to deliver what they need. Your island will grow and prosper to be the envy of the world.

Make cities grow, find more resources, manufacture high-tech goods and build the transportation empire of your dreams. Collect the shiniest fleet of trucks, and other vehicles (buses, airports etc. coming soon!).

You can download and play the game for free. There are also in-game purchases which can be used to enrich and accelerate the experience even further.

-------------
Features:
-------------

* Grow and develop your island and cities
* Deliver tasty goods like fruit, sweets and juices
* Find natural resources and process them into advanced goods
* Collect and upgrade the shiniest fleet of trucks and other vehicles
* Build roads and upgrade them into multi-lane freeways
* Level up to gain access to better vehicles and reveal your island completely!

WHAT'S NEW

Version 0.13
• Player score
• Main UI restructuring
• Google Play Games Services leaderboards
• Player island update, later areas without roads
• Bug fixes
• Balancing
• UI improvements
• Known issue: requests Photos/Media/Files access, there is no need for it

Google Play Download
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fi.bongames.transitking&hl=en

iTunes Download
